review_body: I love the heart rate monitor and sleep tracker. I'm not convinced it counts my steps correctly though, there have definitely been times it didn't count them and other times it counts when I'm not moving.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Got it for wife and she loves it.  Uses it all the time to track distance walked and exercise at gym.  Very good battery life.  Easy to link with phone app.  She likes the app too.

review_title: Great user experience! Easy set up and easy to use!
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: I just received my Fitbit Alta HR today and I love it! The set up was easy and it's easy to use! Just charge it up, sync to phones Bluetooth, and follow a few simple prompts. I look forward to getting back into shape!

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: I like it.  Lightweight.  Just seems like I have to tap it quite a few times to get the screen on.  But other than that, works good.  I also like all the features it has when it's synced to your phone.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: It does everything that i need it to do. Sometimes i have to tap it a few times to get the display to show up, other times it comes up just fine with a twist of my wrist up to viewing it. Note: The band was okay, but i bought one that i liked better at the same time as i purchased the Alta HR.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: I had this for about a month and so far I love it. The band is a bit short, but I like it. Also I used to have the older alta and that one broke, I hope this one last longer.

review_title: It is great if it works, but setup should not be this difficult.
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Even with technical support I cannot get it to connect to my computer or my phone.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: No probs with Amazon. Having a lot of problems with this Fitbit. Called company several times and all they do is reset. Will not purchase another Fitbit again

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: I love this thing, but the battery will no longer hold a charge and it is not even a year old.  Not cool.  Foe the money and the brand I expect better.  Buyer beware!

review_title: Don't buy!  Does not sync with Apple Health App!
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Not recommended. It doesn't sync with Apple Health App and the developer refuses to add the funcionality even when hundreds of people are asking for it.  I returned mine for a refund and i am ordering one that shares data with Health app.

review_title: This thing changed my life. The weird thing is ...
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: This thing changed my life.  The weird thing is I just started taking the reminders seriously and it works! Don't mock yourself. When it says you owe 200 steps, get up and walk it out. I'm recovering from back surgery, and 3 months later I am walking miles every day.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: I don't recommend the pink band. It picked up blue from my jeans etc and looked dirty. I returned it for black.

review_title: I bought this as a gift for my Dad -which ...
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: I bought this as a gift for my Dad -which is not a techy guy- and he absolutely loves it.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: My old Fitbit died after less than 2 months of use. So I ordered this one. It came dead on arrival. Fitbit told me to send it back and they would send me a new one. I had to pay for the packaging to return it. Just got the “replacement” today. All it included was the face, no band and no charger. It’s comepletely unusable. If I want to even gamble that this one will actually work, I’ll have to order a band and charger separately to replace the ones they told me to mail back! I’ll never order another Fitbit.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: I love this fitbit!! The color is great and I get tons of compliments. It is comfortable enough to sleep in. Charge lasts 5 days for me!

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: If love my Fitbit ! At one point I had to resend but have since learned how to track my weight/ strength days and best yet, I can sync to mycigna and get points for staying active. I guess it's like an affirmation that I am doing something great for myself. And I love that I don't need a watch and a fitness tracker so it's practical to wear all the time. I'm also learning about the importance of learn rate too. I highly recommend the sleek fit if the Fitbit hr Alta - I absolutely love it!!

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Good tool to have. Does what it should do. But touchscreen is finicky and not responsive at times. Also this bad does not auto detect exersize periods.

review_title: Paid the extra money for the pretty pink but the color rubbed off quickly and has ...
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Paid the extra money for the pretty pink but the color rubbed off quickly and has a bluish hue.  Looks dingy now :(

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Bought it for the wife and after about three weeks the clasp connecting the strap to the actual fitbit broke requiring a replacement (that we got for free from Fitbit). Would recommend going one step larger or one step smaller in terms of Fitbit product lines.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Very difficult to set up. Once I set up it worked great for about a week. Then it began to count steps incorrectly, wouldn't sync, wouldn't start working and displaying until about 11 am. Such a overpriced item with zero reliability. I do not recommend this product.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: I love my Fitbit! If you are thinking about getting one I highly recommend it. You won’t regret it. I do suggest getting some aftermarket replacement bands because their fastening is better in my opinion than the manufacturer standard (plus having extra colors is fun).

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Might work for some, but not for me. Returning. Didn't like all the synching required (which only worked periodically anyway). Another caution is that the screen is nearly impossible to read if you need glasses for close-up work. Felt good on the wrist, I'll give it that. But I'm sticking with my old heart rate monitor, which gives calories burned as well, without all the "jazz."

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: I liked how light it is on wrist. How it lasts 4 to 5 days on a single charge. I didn’t find any downside for the product to be honest. Maybe just maybe if it was only waterproof or water splash. I’m really careful when it comes to washing my hands.

review_title: While it worked it performed as promised but at 11 ...
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: While it worked it performed as promised but at 11 months it would not hold a charge and Fitbit refused to honor the year warranty!

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: I purchased one from Verizon and it was out in 6 months. This Fitbit works like a charm and it better priced than from the Fitbit store. I will be watching to see if it lasts this time

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: I have small wrists and I new right away this was not going to work out. There was a small gap on each side and it was painful to wear. I ended up returning it and getting an Amazfit Bip. I'm happy with my choice because.

review_title: Exellent app for the Alta HR
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: The Alta HR has what I needed and works great. Heart rate monitor is right on or within 2 of my Orion blood pressure cuff. It does have a high profile which tends to catch on things easily, so would consider the Charge 3 due to its thinner profile if I had a do over.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Love it!! Helps to keep me active and I enjoy the ability to see my heart rate. Haven't reviewed my sleep data yet but love the fact that it's available for my review. The design is both functional and beautiful which makes it versatile.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: I had 2 fitbits prior to this one and they lasted for years. This purchase lasted 4 months. It suddenly stopped charging. Perhaps it was a lemon of the bunch, but it certainly did not last long.

review_title: Bought my Fitbit Alta HR not long ago through Amazon ...
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Bought my Fitbit Alta HR  not long ago through Amazon and 7 months later, it’s no longer working.  The screen turned black (off) and willNOT turn on. The battery is fully charged .  So don’t know what went wrong.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: I love this Fitbit! This is the 4th style of Fitbit I have had so far and it is by far my favorite. I had the flex & flex 2 (loved them both but they broke) & I had the one that resembles an Apple Watch. I liked the features but it was too big... the Alta is the best of both worlds. Gives text notifications and is still nice and small!!

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Love this device, and love the elegant iPhone app. Small and weightless on your wrist. My wife and I wear and use it every day. So helpful to monitor how much we're moving (or not). Especially for people who struggle with weight gain--Step 1 should be wear a Fitbit and see how many steps per day. It tells the whole story!

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: The fitbit was interesting, but it never held a charge for more than a few days and after less than a month it stopped charging altogether. I contacted the company and they agreed to replace it. It took 1 1/2 weeks for the replacement to come and then it was only a partial replacement. If I had known they were going to take so long and not replace the whole thing, I would have returned it to Amazon for a total refund.

review_title: Love this! I will say I ended up getting ...
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Love this!I will say I ended up getting different bands (SKYLET 3 Pack Silicone Breathable Wristbands for Fitbit Alta and Fitbit Alta HR Bracelet) because my skin had a reaction to wearing this one all the time.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Heavy drain on phone battery. Only way I can use the Alta HR is to turn off Bluetooth and log out of the Fitbit app then turn back on once a day to sync. Would not buy again.

review_title: but it was a huge waste of money
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: The heart rate monitor isn't accurate when working out, which is the main purpose I ordered this. Unfortunately, I missed the return window by a couple of days. I tried to give this a chance, but it was a huge waste of money.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: I have to tap it MULTIPLE times in order to get the screen info to appear. This is a big hassle. Sometimes nothing shows up at all despite battery being charged. It does NOT turn on when you raise your wrist. So finding out the time is a task, not something that should be easy to see.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Great fitbit. Keeps me moving and displays my status throughout the day. The battery lasts between 6 & 7 days. This is an upgrade for me, I had a flex before.

review_title: From the beginning it was not tracking accurately. steps ...
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: From the beginning it was not tracking accurately, steps were way off ( I walked 8 steps while sleeping) for one.  It totally stopped tracking on my app. It was synced and connected to blue tooth. troubleshooted, synced, turned blue tooth off/on etc..nothing.  lost three days of my work outs and all the other activity's.Sadly it was returned.

review_title: Watch seems to make up heart rate
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: This watch displays my heart rate when I'm not even wearing it. It also records me as having slept when I'm not wearing it. My friends and I tried putting it on each person's wrist to see what heart rate was recorded, and it gave us all basically the same HR estimate. What's the point of this if it doesn't measure anything correctly?

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: This was a gift for a friend. I really like the Fitbits and this model is no exception.  Really quite easy to setup and with the App for the iPhone very easy to use.  This is the third I've purchased on Amazon. 2 were gifts.

review_title: Now I gotta buy me one
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Got this as a gift for my fiance. He loves it. Now I'm thinking of buying one for me. The price is so amazing. Especially when they are 20 bucks more at competing stores. Comes very well packaged and safe. You won't regret getting this

review_title: Was weighing an a Fitbit Alta HR vs an Apple ...
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Was weighing an a Fitbit Alta HR vs an Apple Watch 3, and for me the deciding factor was indeed weight. I wasn't looking for an all-purpose computer on my wrist; I wanted a device to help me focus on my fitness goals. The slimmer profile and lighter weight of the Alta HR made it the winner.

review_title: Disliked display compared to Charge HR
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: I ordered this to replace my much-loved and well-worn Charge HR.  It finally died, and I thought now that the Alta had HR capability, it would make sense to try a smaller profile.Found the Alta display to be awkward - the horizontal option required a turn of the wrist to view, and the vertical which I chose was truncated and annoying.  Worse was the fact that to light up the display, I often had to tap repeatedly.  Returning and ordering the Blaze.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: So happy that my fitbit came 3 days before the expected arrival date! I ordered the blue but got the black instead but I also ordered different bands so I'm not too upset.  Works as described.  Would recommend!

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: It is now 14 months since I bought this product and another identical one for my wife.  Mine has stopped recording heart rate and sleep tracking data.  Fitbit customer service can't do anything to get it to work.  Out of warranty after one year.  It's now just a decorative bracelet.... disappointed to say the least.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Overall, really nice. The part where the straps connect to the watch became loose fairly quick and eventually fell off. Luckily you can buy a whole pack of replacement straps in all colors for really cheap and it fixes the problem.

review_title: It's what technology is supposed to do for us humans
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: My fitbit and I are now best buds.  We go everywhere together and it tells me when to get off my hind end and move. I like to see how many steps I've taken and to sync it with my Weight Watchers app and scale. It's what technology is supposed to do for us humans.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: And it's a watch too, which is super convenient.

review_title: This was a Christmas present for my daughter. The ...
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: This was a Christmas present for my daughter. The charger was missing from the box so it cannot be used until we receive a replacement. Very disappointing.

review_title: This is a great dainty Fitbit
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: This is a great dainty Fitbit.  The only drawback is that I miss knowing how many flights of stairs I've climbed.  The heart rate monitor is good, I like the improved sleep monitoring and I LOVE that I can change the band.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: I got another metal bracelet that I like better.  But I like that it does all that it says it will and will give me messages from my phone so I don't miss them.

review_title: FAILED SLEEP TRACKER, NO SUPPORT SATISFACTION
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: If you’re thinking of purchasing this to track your sleep, don’t. Erratic would be too kind. It missed most of my sleep most of the time; then their customer support kept me jumping through hoops until after the return window had closed. This is NOT a reliable sleep tracker, not even close. Don’t waste your money.

review_title: My Fitbit Did Not Last A Year
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: This was great until today! I purchased it 9 months ago and today I noticed it is not tracking by steps by half. I walked 3.17 miles today but my FitBit tracked 1.8 miles. I thought surely it had at least a warranty of a year....but nope. I only had 30 days to return it. You would expect that an item that is relatively expensive would have more  than a 9 month life span.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Won't hold a charge.

review_title: Love that it syncs to my iPhone
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Got this as a gift for my mother-in-law. She loves it. Loves the features and said it’s fashionable. I have one as well. Love that it syncs to my iPhone. I can see my calls and messages on display. Highly recommend it.

review_title: Already in LOVE! This is my 3rd fit bit tracker
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Already in LOVE! This is my 3rd fit bit tracker. I upgrade anytime they have a new one. I love the color and the features to this one. I can read texts and see who is calling me from my fit bit. Very happy with my purchase

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: This is my first experience with the FitBit brand, fitness tracker. I previously owned a Jawbone Up and I am excited that I made the switch! I enjoy the real time, heart rate tracker throughout the day. I have been using my new FitBit for approximately 3 weeks now, so I have not tinkered with all of the features available to me. I will add that I am happy with this purchase and I look forward to daily use. I will note that the band requires charging after four (4) full days of use, but that does not bother me.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: LOVE my Fitbit. Helping me reach my fitness and weight loss goals. I didn't even realize how good the calorie counter element of this app would be, but it's awesome. I also use the Coaching app that syncs with this for indoor workouts.

review_title: A Good Replacement to Old Fitbit
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: My old Fitbit that I wore on my pocket finally kicked the bucket so I purchased the Fitbit Alta HR to replace it. It works as expected and I've had no problems so far (other than getting used to wearing something on my wrist all the time).

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: I bought this about 2 months ago and so far so good. I find most of the basic activity tracking is accurate but occasionally I'll have to delete erroneous activity logs or adjust them, particularly for non-cardio based workouts such as lifting.The sleep tracking/insights and heart rate monitor are what drew me to this product and both work fabulously. I hope with future software updates Fitbit will expand some of the functionality/tracking available for these features.

review_title: Short life. Not the best quality.
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: This band was more expensive than the one sold on the website, I found out later, and within six months the band became loose and  came off. I switched the bands but the problems persists. nothing seems damaged apparently.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: I found the readout too small for my taste. Difficult to read outdoors, even when in the shade. All the features are nice but not a good fit for these old eyes. A larger model my be the answer.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: It takes forever for my phone to connect to this Fitbit. My phone has no problems connecting to my car and other devices but it has incredible difficulty connecting to this watch. It's very frustrating. I'm literally holding the phone right next to the watch and it can't find it. It's hard to if the problem is entirely with the watch or partially with the phone but since the phone connects to other things without a problem, I suspect the problem mainly lies with the watch. It's a significant problem.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: So wish I could say that I was happy with the product, but my second Fitbit just broke at the year and 2 week mark making it AGAIN out of the warranty.  First one was as Alta and the second the Alta HR. Think it is it time to look at better quality merchandise.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Got the fitbit because I thought I would challenge myself. I have. I've went from 3000 steps to 6000 daily! Love watching my sleep patterns too

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: This is PERFECT!  It fits well and is sturdy in construction.  The Fitbit is a very motivational tool for me as it reminds me to get off my but and get to WALKING!!  :)

review_title: ... have had it for a week now and works great. Love the fact that i can see my ...
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: I have had it for a week now and works great. Love the fact that i can see my sleep patterns thru my smartphone.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Love it. Wear it every day.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Good quality and build. Step count isn't as accurate as I thought it would but it's expected being lower model. Mainly used for sleep tracking. Band is a bit stiff and gets a bit sticky when hot.

review_title: I love my new Fitbit Alta HR
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: I love my new Fitbit Alta HR! The coral wristband fits nicely and love the cool color!The order arrived very promptly.Thank you.Kathie

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: I was in love with my fitbit until I began to excruciating pain from it. My wrist has a mark on it like it has been burned and the pain in my wrist was unbearable.  i had to take something for the pain and not where it for a few days for the pain to stop.  Please let me know why this has happened and what can be done about it.  I have a LOVE/HATE relationship with my FitBit.  HELP!

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: I absolutely love my new Fitbit!!  It's smaller and more colorful than my previous one!  I enjoy wearing it everyday to keep track of my activity and helps me to monitor my health habits.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: I love this fitbit. This is the first one I have purchased so I am not sure what other ones are out there, but I am very happy with this one.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Love the Fitbits, this one is even better than the Fitbit Alta because I can track my heartrate as well. Always great products, highly recommend them!

review_title: Will not stand behind their product after 75 days!
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: This fitbit lasted me 5 months before it shutdown and could not be reset.  i worked with their customer service department that ran me through a bunch of "quick fix" exercises and sent me an email of things I should try.  After exhausting all of their suggestions they will not return an email and was told on the phone its out of warranty.  Crappy product and service!

review_title: Used it for a month, found out calories burned wasn't based off my data, decided to get a Charge 2 HR instead.
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: I *really* wanted to like the Fitbit Alta HR, it has some really cool features (love the sleep feature)!  However, the main reason I bought it was for how many calories I burned while exercising.  Which is where this Fitbit falls short.  *I am aware that no fitness tracker is 100% accurate and is to be used as a guide.PROS:1) Sleep tracker is really cool! (Again, not 100% accurate but still useful)2) Heart rate monitor seems to be pretty accurate--I tried it with multiple machines at my gym and they were within 1 digit of each other (ex: 129/130)3) Fitbit Community Forum is helpful!4) Still connects to my phone even at work, I am usually between 30-50 feet away from it.CONS:1) Tracking (real time) exercises only gives 3 options: walking, running, and hiking. Any other exercises you'll need to use auto-tracking.2) Auto-tracking exercises works about 60% of the time.  You need to have a consistent heart rate for at least 15 min (you can adjust it to 10) but it will sometimes only save part of your exercises *after* you hit that 10/15 min mark.  For the times it doesn't auto-track you have to manually enter your exercises.3) When manually entering exercises, the "calories burned" are *not based off of your own data* it is based on a population average. (found this out from fitbit community) I noticed that it was saying I burned way more calories for some exercises than what was possible, (ex: said I burned over 600 calories for jogging 30 min on a treadmill).  The amount of calories burned was the main reason why I bought it, and I was so angry when I found out it was based off an estimate rather than my own data.  Seriously? Did I pay over $100 for an estimate? I can do that crap myself for FREE.*Again, I am aware that no fitness tracker is 100% accurate, and should be used as a guide, but again if it's based off an estimate and not my data then it's useless to me.I tried different suggestions from the Fitbit community to hopefully fix my issues, but unfortunately, nothing worked. (if you have an android you might have a chance)After this I decided to return my Alta HR in exchange for a Charge 2 HR. I have a friend who uses it and says it'll do exactly what I'm looking for.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Perfect for HR tracking, love that I can see my texts and calls on it. If you're not interested in fitness info, this isn't for you though.

review_title: my Fitbit motivates me to move
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: you get messages and phone call alerts but your phone has to be near you. if not you won't get notified, I also wish the clock would be displayed at all times instead of having to twist my wrist. I'm keeping my Fitbit though its simple and motivates me.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: My wife LOVES this fitbit. It is something she wears constantly and she loves all of the features this one provides. It is small so she only takes it off to charge.

review_title: Love but seems like I'm charging frequently
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: I love this but it doesn't hold a charge as long as I think it should. I had a Flex and if had to be charged ever other day which is why I got this one. I have to charge a couple times a week which seems a little frequent. Maybe that's normal.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: The coral color gets dirty very quickly. I’m very disappointed! It looks brown not coral anymore. I wish I could return it.Also when I’m working out it just stops reading my heartbeat.

review_title: DONT BUY THIS IF YOU WANT TO MONITOR YOUR SLEEP
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Don't buy this if you want to monitor your sleep.  And particularly if you get up in the middle of the night for any reason.  It can't figure out what to do with that and so does nothing of any use.  The Jawbone UP 3 was good at this but is no longer an option.

review_title: I've had 3 fitbits and this one is the best of the bunch
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: I've had 3 fitbits and this one is the best of the bunch. Part of that is because the app and excersize auto-detect have gotten so much better that you don't need the bigger interfaces. Every thing I do on my fitbit is through the app now. The alta hr sits nicely on my wrist, it looks and feels light. I had the blaze for so long but it was so big and i couldn't use it in direct sunlight - can't see the display.  The altra hr + the fitbit app is near perfect for my needs

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Much better than my old HR, this Fitbit watch holds its charge a whole lot longer. Hard to see the display outside in the sun. Comfortable, but I have to put a wrist sweatband under it when working out to protect it from moisture. Nice look to it.

review_title: Don't leave it in the sun!
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: I wpuld give 5 stars but was recently on a camping trip and took this off to go in the water and the sun totally zapped the battery even though I had charged it completely just the day before.  Other than that it's great!

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Since I got this, I've found that the charger is very finicky to get to connect and start charging. I consistently clean the elements, but still have issues with getting it to charge. As of the last month, It doesn't seem to link to charge at all. I've only had this for a couple months now. Very disappointed.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Love it.  Don't think about it.  Just get it. Sizing is trouble free.  Even a or will fit a small wrist because there are so many holes. Easy set up.  I just YouTube's it. I was all set in about five minutes

review_title: Fitbit, please consider redesigning your bands.
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: My Fitbit initially worked well but the band became a problem. The band constantly popped opened. Unfortunately, I ended up losing my Fitbit at the Atlanta airport nearly a year ago.

review_title: She says there's not a thing she doesn't like about it
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: My daughter loves it and wears it every day. She wanted something less involved and smaller than an apple watch and preferred this. She says there's not a thing she doesn't like about it.

review_title: and it was easy to teach her how to use it
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Bought this as a gift for my mom. She loves it, and it was easy to teach her how to use it. She isn't the best at using technology, but this is simple, and effective. I have heard nothing but great things from her.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Works great for me!

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Awesome, lightweight watch! I love my FitBit Alta HR. It tracks my steps, distance, heart rate, sleep patterns, and exercise. Setting the watch up to Bluetooth on my phone is a plus as I can view messages on my screen. If you want to know just the basics of your overall movement/fitness level I suggest this watch!

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: After owning the Nike fuelband and the Jawbone Up4, this is my least favorite workout band, and this band device wears horribly.  It's not worth the price, and as of today, it's come unloose three times this morning, so basically I'm at risk for losing an overprice workout band.  Don't waste your money.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: This has saved me. So I work as a secretary and I have lots of injury due to a car accident. It was advised that I be more active which is hard to do in my work place. But the Fitbit is extremely helpful. It gives me reminders to get up and move. The app helps me with my calorie count. And it made me realize I do not sleep enough. I adore it.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: I do like the smaller size of the face, Wish it were flatter to be more comfortable. It just doesn’t record the time I go to sleep accurately. At least once a week it records I fell asleep hours later than I did. Last night, I went to sleep about 11:45, this morning FitBit said I went to sleep at 4:23 am. One of the biggest reasons I bought the thing is to record my sleep cycles, but so far not happy with it. It does keep steps pretty well. But wish it were more accurate with sleep.

review_title: I love this Fitbit So Much
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: I love this Fitbit So Much!  I love that it tells me if I am getting a call or a text.  It's easy to read and the battery stays charged for several days.  Its very easy to change the band color.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Product was opened and the charger was missing

review_title: ... to replace an "Up" and I am a little disappointed that the Fitbit counts when you move your hands
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: I bought this to replace an "Up" and I am a little disappointed that the Fitbit counts when you move your hands. I am a programmer so I am typing all day long so even before I got up I have 2 miles done. I will keep using it but I know it is not as accurate as my old one.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Works perfectly and I’ve had it for months now! Read the description- TRUE to stated description. This is a cool gadget to have and I prefer it over Apple Watch. It’s simplicity is what I love most!

review_title: ... 2 and which was a little bulkier than she liked so when the Alta HR came out I treated ...
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Gift for the wife and she loves it she had a Charge HR 2 and which was a little bulkier than she liked so when the Alta HR came out I treated her to a Slimer model. She adores it

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Easy to use. Keeps me motivated because I'm reminded to move and get those 10,000 steps. I check the app on my iPhone multiple times a day. The best part is it doesn't scream "I have a fitness tracker on my wrist!". I ordered the black and gray version, but wish I would've purchased the black band instead. I think it would be even more discrete if it was monochromatic.

review_title: So happy! Alta HR of Charge 2?
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: I am so glad I decided to buy a fit bit!! I was between the Alta HR and the Charge 2. I decided on the Alta HR because it is smaller and it would fit on my wrist better and now that I wear it everyday I am glad I chose the smaller of the two. I just wish the Alta HR counted the flights of stairs I walked everyday.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: I had wanted the Fitbit Alta HR for a long time, I had open heart surgery and it had all the features I wanted in a small package. Now the only time I take it off is when I shower or it needs charging. I Love it because it tracks everything from sleep and exercise to heart rate. It was a great choice for me.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: I received my Fitbit Alta HR the following day!  I love the Alta HR - it will remind me to get up and challenge me to complete 100-200 steps.  I love the heart rate and sleep monitor.  This is a great device.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: I love my Fitbit Alta HR. It has totally motivated me to get active! I love the little notifications it gives me to remind me to MOVE. Like "Wanna Stroll?", then rewards me when I do with... "Nailed It!" Battery lasts me a week & recharges in less than an hour. Gives the time & date, number to daily steps, Heart rate, Calories burned, Daily miles & Active Minutes. Nice, slim and comfortable. I have had it since January 2108 and I would highly recommend this product.

review_title: Buy it if you have to much money to waste !
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: I have used Fitbit for years and last 2 has issues after 15 months but with 2 years warranty , that was quickly replaced with a new one. However they changed the warranty to one year only and then again major issue after 15 months . All they said is they can not fix it, I just have to buy another new one ! Who spend more than 130 for a fitness tracker and only last for a bit more than a year ! Shame that it's a design but the quality does not match up !

review_title: Great for weight loss. Far better than iHealth app.
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Very good at keeping track of how I’m doing so I can accomplish my weight loss goals. I wouldn’t recommend for a serious athlete due to lack of more advanced features.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: The heart rate and sleep monorting feature make this a great health companion. The app is very user friendly! Lightweight design. The blue/gray color is very nutural and wears well with most clothing.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: I was skeptical purchasing one of these after having pedometers over the years...but I really am happy i gave it a try.  It really keeps me on my toes...I'll even spend extra minutes at night walking just to get the last steps in...I really like the food log as well.

review_title: This is a terrible product. It spends more time on the charger ...
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: This is a terrible product. It spends more time on the charger than on my wrist. I have had it only a month and the strap just broke. Buy something else. This one is terrible.

review_title: Overall as expected. Strap is stiff and hard to ...
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Overall as expected. Strap is stiff and hard to break in.  No feature for number of flights of stairs climbed. Item sits high on your wrist and bangs against counters and doorways if you don't adjust for its height.

review_title: The new Alta is a step forward
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Works great. My favorite Fitbit yet. The band finally incorporates a standard watch type clasp that is much more secure. A step up from the Alta.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Item was new as described does all that it says it will do! Item shipped faster than it orig said!! I would recommend this product and the seller!

review_title: Works great. I had one issue with it not lighting ...
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Works great. I had one issue with it not lighting up but I plugged it in and restarted it and it has worked fine ever since. The battery lasts about 5-7 days for me and syncs well with my phone.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: There is a bit of a learning curve adding and learning the tricks for a new Fitbit device but the additional feedback is well worth the effort!  Like the smaller sized face.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Wife had a charge2 that she loved but wanted something slimmer that worked as well. This is it. Easy to sync, use and wear daily. With a few aftermarket bands (easy to change) this goes everywhere.

review_title: Save your money if you want to monitor your sleep quality
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: I tried two of these from different places and neither of them worked past a couple days in the sleep monitoring mode. The step counter I suspect was also not accurate. I give up on this model....

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Awesome!! Helps me manage my daily schedule and keeps me motivated.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Not terribly responsive. I need to tap it quite aggressively to wake it and change screens. Tracks steps and heart rate relatively well. Setting alarms is cumbersome and unreliable. My Fitbit has yet to notify me of texts and calls. Meh... It is wearable on my small wrist. Fit bit trainer app is gimmicky. I might spend more and get an I-watch...

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: I just unboxed and started using about 2 weeks ago. Last couple days fitbit stopped taking a charge when plugged in.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: I love this so much, I got one for my mom and my mother in law for Xmas. Seems to be accurate and I love all of the features.

review_title: I've purchased a Charge HR, Charge 2, and ...
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: I've purchased a Charge HR, Charge 2, and Alta HR in the last two years, for my girlfriend. There were tracking issues with both the Charge HR and Charge 2, but there are so many issues with the Alta HR that she refuses to wear it and went back to her Charge 2.I missed the 30 day Amazon return policy by 4 days. I then contacted Fitbit, as they have a 45 day satisfaction guarantee. It turns out that is only if you purchase the product from their site.I don't plan on purchasing another product from them.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: I love love love my Alta HR in Rose. It works and does everything it says. Two cons not being waterproof and scratch resistant. I did scratch it getting out of my car. It's a small scratch not noticeable but I see it. So I recommend purchasing the shield protection with the watch right away so that you can put it on the watch before wearing it. Besides that l love the product i hope they do come out with a newer Alta Hr but waterproof.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Works great and has fantastic features.Charging system is much improved over old Fitbit. The only problem is that it does not accurately reflect the number of hours slept.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Pros: Looks nice and can easily be accessorized or turn it to a more professional look.Battery lastsCons: The clasp  is a big disappointment.You have to be connected to the internet to sync your data.It doesn't count stairs nor pushing cartsSometimes you have to push it hard to read your or check time and then it goes so fast.

review_title: Does what I wanted it to do
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: I purchased this to see what kind of sleep I was getting...who knew I would end up loving all the other features so much!!!!

review_title: Good in use but broke too soon
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: It's my third Fitbit, and first two started to malfunction within a year of use, but I've read reviews about improved quality of Alta hr and decided to give it a try.Very well made, and very accurate, with a sturdy feel.But after only two months of use heart rate monitor just died.The most annoying part is that Fitbit support refuses to send the replacement to my country, while they were able to send one that I bought here without any questions. So buy that on your own risk.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Purchased for my wife. She loves the thin look/design. Good item for keeping yourself motivated to move around and track your activities.

review_title: Band Disconnects from the face of the Fitbit, so Fitbit falls off.
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: I bought the Fitbit Alta HR in July 2018. I loved the way this Fitbit analyzed my sleep. The only problem was the band would disconnect at the face of the watch. I would reconnect it, by snapping it back down in place. Unfortunately, the last time this happened, I was not aware, so I no longer have my Fitbit Alta HR. I would not recommend buying this product, since I’d be afraid to lose it again.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: I love this so much. I previously had the Fitbit change HR and while I loved it for most of the same reasons, I really wanted a smaller band. So now that the Alta has heart rate I knew I had to give it a go. I’m not sure if I sync this one more than I did the other but it does seem to need to be charged a lot. That’s the only complaint I have.

review_title: Incorrect statistics! Called Fitbit and rep claimed this sometimes ...
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Incorrect statistics!Called Fitbit and rep claimed this sometimes occurs and to just reset the statistics.Seller never responded to return request.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Broke had fitbit send replacement and after 2 weeks that one broke as well... Stay away from this!

review_title: Loved it so much I bought two!
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: I bought one of these watches when it came out.  My mom ended up using it one day and she loved it I had to buy her one!Easy to set up with the app, tracks heart rate accurately, and has so many useful features.  It isn't bulky or uncomfortable to wear, sometimes I fall asleep with it on forgetting it's there.Overall, great watch, comfortable, and durable.

review_title: Luv my new Alta except screen isn't quite as bright ...
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Luv my new Alta except screen isn't quite as bright as the charge and requires a few more taps to show activities than it originally stated.

review_title: I would like someone to replace my Fitbit
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: I would please like to know who to speak to about replacing my Fitbit

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Bought as a gift. I have one myself that I got as a gift and love the heart rate and sleep information. Now we can compare.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Love this!! It shows everything possible and I've lost 30lbs already by trying to beat my friends in our weekly competitions!!

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Super cute but the coral color gets dirty way too quickly

review_title: I love this! It helps me remember to get up ...
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: I love this!  It helps me remember to get up once an hour to walk and counts my steps. Plus I love the sleep reports and it is so comfortable to Wear. I don't ever want to be  without one.

review_title: Looks good. Helps me with my overall health
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Works well.  Looks good.  Helps me with my overall health.  Of all the fitness trackers on the market, I believe the power resides in the software (on your computer or smartphone)--not in the actual tracking device.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Be warned. It is not compatible with every phone. I spent 2 hours trying to get it to connect and never did get it connected even after following all of their troubleshooting ideas. I finally found an article online that states that not all phones are compatible including the one that I own. I'm sending it back.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Why do they only offer a 45-day warranty? I'm on #3 Charge and its already having issues within 69 days.DO NOT BUY!

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Bought for my mom. She absolutely loves it. She prefers its slimmer design that the Charge 2. Only wish it was waterproof.

review_title: and it sure is a well made device and nicely small. after half a year or so it ...
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: used it for a while, and it sure is a well made device and nicely small. after half a year or so it got boring though to track myself

review_title: the small fit wonderfully. The rubber band is comfortable and doesn’t slide ...
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: At 5’3”, 127lbs, the small fit wonderfully. The rubber band is comfortable and doesn’t slide around when I work out. Watch face is simple and clean. Much more comfortable than the Charge I had before, and smaller.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: I'm very sensitive about jewelry - I rarely wear it. But this is so light (and doesn't shift around) that I don't even notice it. App is intuitive to use. The sleep tracking is with the cost of admission. I'm enjoying this process very much.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: I have really small wrists and am not used to wearing watches. With its small size it was easy to get used to. I wear it everyday and love that accuracy of steps, heart rate, and sleep tracking. Just wish it was waterproof.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Love it!  Finally a band that is narrow with HR.  I have always wanted a narrower band with HR.  I love to wear bracelets and have a very narrow wrist.  This perfect.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: This was a gift for my daughter and she LOVES it! So far everything is working flawlessly. It really helps her be more aware of her daily steps and encourages her to move.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: A Christmas gift for my mother. She loves it. Very well sized on her petite wrist. The screen is small but still visible.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Fits true to size! Second fitbit I've owned. Wish it had the stopwatch like my old HR, but guess if I can upgrade later on. Works awesome! Ordered a small.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Good quality and works excellent

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: I mainly got this to try to track my sleep.  Sometimes it had difficulty with that (though that could have been the band I put on it before.  I have a new band, so we'll see.) but it still tracks pretty well.  It sometimes tracks steps when I'm changing clothes, though, but I guess that's because of how much I can move around with it.  Much better than the Fitbit I had before, though.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Bought originally to track sleep and heart rate, knowing that it isn’t 100% accurate but the functions are neat. The only thing that leaves me wanting something else is a reminder to drink water and a way to turn the fit bit off when you aren’t wearing it. All in all worth it!

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: It’s only been a few days but I’m happy with it so far.  It’s supposed to “wake up” to show the time when you tilt your wrist up - it doesn’t always. But am still happy with it and am considering the Fitbit kids versions for both my kids.

review_title: I love this fit bit it tells my heart rate incoming ...
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: I love this fit bit it tells my heart rate incoming calls and texts,time,date and then I can check my phone for all my exercise info

review_title: Definitely purchase the warranty. Screen is so fragile- especially ...
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Definitely purchase the warranty. Screen is so fragile- especially for being a fitness tracker. I cracked mine in 30 days while I was washing a glass pitcher and hit the glass- not even hard. Lesson learnt.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Meh! It's quite literally unreadable in bright sunlight. You can't set anything but the time to a large font. The Android App periodically freezes and hangs (App v2.49 on Nougat 7.1.1). The App can't seem to figure out average pace length by distance traveled (GPS) divided by steps taken. The traveled distance reported by the App can often vary significantly from GPS or odometer sources. The tracker is clueless to alpine or telemark skiing activity. Bluetooth sync fails and must be reattempted about 1 of 4 tries. Maybe that's the Nexus6 phone? But there aren't similar sync probs with Fitbit One or AndroidWear devices. After 2 months consistent use, I have Fitbit regrets. Craigslist, eBay - maybe a hand-me-down to the kids - this won't be on my wrist much longer. But let me end on a positive note: With a huge variety of fashionable bands, this is currently among the most stylish lifestyle fitness trackers available. "It's better to loook mahvelous than to be mahvelous!"

review_title: If you raise your arms or play with your hair don’t buy this
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: It counted me while sitting, as a step everytime I lifted my arm and stroked my hair. So do not lift your arms, it’ll count it as a step. Totally inaccurate. Returned product.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Great for a few weeks and stopped working properly. Known issue with this model/batch not resetting with each day. Support unwilling to exchange and told us to wait until their engineers figure it out. It's been a week so far.... the market is flooded with more affordable trackers, I chose Fitbit because they're established and I thought, reliable.  With this kind of issue, should have chosen one of the new companies.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Like the slimmer style...longer battery life...easy charging mechanism.  Does not always show data with tapping it once or twice as it sometimes takes several "hits".  It has been quite accurate in reading heart rate which I watch closely due to having some heart issues.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Love it! Purchased to replace Surge, was too big, couldn't chg bands. This one is slim, lightweight and has the option to chg bands. Black leather band in pic

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: I had the Charge HR and switched to Alta HR for a sleeker look. Now I am still wearing my charge HR to the gym because the Alta is not accurately capturing my heart rate during workouts. I read online that both watches use the same heart rate technology so I’m not sure what is wrong with my Alta. I would return but threw away the box upon opening it as I’ve purchased fitbits before and never had a problem.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: I really love my new Fitbit. The details are exactly as printed. The battery lasts almost the entire week. The only reason I upgraded was for the $30.00 rebate. After waiting a month after mailing I was assured that with the amazon purchase I would qualify. Only to be told no. Please keep that in mind if you are depending on the rebate. Otherwise I really like everything about my Fitbit.

review_title: a little harder to use than I expected. plus ...
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: a little harder to use than I expected. plus when I turn over at night it lights up, not fond of that.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Charge seems to go in less than one day, only works intermittently. Started malfunctioning immediately upon the end of the Amazon return period.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: I had the Fitbit for a few months now and for tracking it’s great however my band broke off.  I’ll be contacting Amazon first and then FitBit as they have another deficiency in the design.  My first Fitbit that I bought at Staples 3 years ago the battery wouldn’t hold a charge and the strap broke off then too.  Not sure if I’ll buy another after this latest experience.

review_title: Perfect gift easy to set up and use app
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: My girlfriend loves this. Perfect Christmas present. Easy to set up and charge. App is easy to use, android version.

review_title: Helps me keep track of walking.
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Being diabetic this helps me stay on track with exercising.  Counts my step and let’s me know my heart rate.  Even tells me how much I slept.  Good thing to help track your activity

review_title: I absolutely love my fit bit
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: I absolutely love my fit bit. However, I hate the fact that band get so dirty.  It was black after only one week of wear. The good thing is that you can also buy other bands from Amazon.

review_title: So far so good! No syncing issues
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: So far so good! No syncing issues. I have figured out the tapping- tap two times(normal touch) and it works perfectly! I am little nervous about the band where it holds on the Fitbit itself, it’s a little loose but I will take it somewhere to have it looked at or check one in stores to see if it does it too! Other than that, it’s been great! And it’s PERFECT for little wrist people:)

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: I like the slim design and useful features of this product.  It really encourages me to get moving throughout the day.

review_title: Good device, wrist band could last longer
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Overall it works well. Battery is still lasting over 5 days, but I should say I'm a very basic user - no automated/continuos sync. HAfter about 9 months I had to replace the wrist band that broke despite of cautious use. Replaced with a large size just like the original size I purchased, and it is much bigger than the original.

review_title: I would not buy this again, Fitbit Alta HR. 4/2017
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Don't buy this, the step counter is very exaggerated, it doesn't measure heart rate very well during workouts! The only redeeming factor is the sleep tracker has the ability to track anytime you sleep including any naps. Which I love. Other than that I will stick with my Polar for accurate heart tracking during any and all workouts!

review_title: The new Fitbit Alta HR Special Edition Black
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Fitbit Alta HR is tracking my sleep pattern and heart rate pretty accurately.  Not too big, and comfortable to wear.  The fitbit Alta HR does steps but not flights of stairs.  So it depends on what you think is most important to keep track of.  The fitbit Alta HR has a nice band with a watch band type of closure with a clasp.  I like this special edition all black.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: awesome thing, if you are on edge S / L size better take Large you will have room for future. I was waiting for 1.5h of full charging after unboxing.For notifications from phone uses Bluetooth enabled all the time, which drains Alta/phone battery fast.Track sleep unexpectedly good (even for bad, mostly sleepless night its automatically detected all phases).Not shower-proof is a disappointment for me, but they call this out in specs so read twice before you buy :)

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Wish I could give it negative stars...nothing like giving someone a gift that doesn’t work! Would not sync also you must tap the hell out of it for the display...probably why so many break within a few months

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Arrived in perfect condition. I don't use it as much as I thought I would, but has cool features and I would recommend for others. I think it's worth the price.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Bought it for heart rate and sleep.  did something weird to my arm.  I thought I had a melanoma till I stopped wearing it. !!It did work, but not flawlessly

review_title: Holds a charge, great way to challenge myself to better fitness
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Received the Fitbit quickly. It works like a charm. Easy to connect to my iPhone and only needs to be charged a couple of times a week.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Product has barely been used and will no longer charge. This is the 2nd Fitbit I’ve had issues with. Extremely disappointed. Constantly disconnected when contacting their customer service for assistance.

review_title: Damaged Fitbit - Alta HR; replaced by Fitbit!
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: This Fitbit worked great for a few months. Within 3 months, it stopped tracking my heartrate and sleep. I learned these two functions work together. I tried all the troubleshooting recommendations on the Fitbit site and none worked.  Fitbit replaced my damaged one with a new one - no charge. So far, so good with the new one!

review_title: I've reset multiple times and still horrible. DO NOT BUY
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: i've had nothing but problems with this fitbit since i got it. Either completely inaccurate tracking sleep, heart rate, distance, length of workout, a work out or doesn't track at all. I've reset multiple times and still horrible. DO NOT BUY!!!!

review_title: You'll be lucky if it lasts past 1 year of use
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: This is my 2nd Fitbit and last one.  I've had this a little over a year and the battery is shot - Fitbit support will not replace it.  I'm lucky if a full charge lasts 8-10 hours anymore.  Sorry Fitbit but I'm not going to spend $140 every year.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Use my fit all the time. Tracks my sleep and walking. I manually put in my cycling class. I get a weekly report. Works great

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: When I bought my Fitbit, I was worried that I would use it for a month or two and then move on and forget about it. Not the case at all! I’ve had my Fitbit for a nearly six months and wear it every day. I really like the reminders to move, and this definitely motivates me to be more active. I haven’t had any issues at all.

review_title: Step Count & Heart Rate not accurate
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Purchased shortly after the device release (my band is grey) - generally like the wearable, however the step count is inconsistent when other movements can tick off a step and the biggest error is the Heart Rate - my device read 174 HR (70 yr old female) when I was walking on a treadmill at my health club - hmmmm, the treadmill read 105HR.  I'll believe the treadmill as my chest wasn't exploding.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Doesn't have all the bells and whistles of my Blaze, but its small size is perfect for my wife's small wrist and records her activity, pulse rate, and quality and length of her sleep cycle. (And she LOVES the pink and gold exterior!)

review_title: Tracks my sleep I love it
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: I love my Fitbit watch. I use it every day and rarely take it off. I don’t shower with it. It tracks my sleep very well

review_title: I love knowing how many steroids I'm taking and tracking my ...

review_body: Ask going strong after a year.  I've had no problems and I wear it every day.  I love knowing how many steroids I'm taking and  tracking my sleep.  I linked it to Yumei scale and Lose It app.

review_title: I like it, but requires charging a couple of times ...

review_title: Nice Looking But Needs Charge More Often Than The Charge

review_body: I love the looks of this Fitbit, especially since I added a nice leather band. However, I have to charge it every few days unlike my Charge that I only had to recharge once a week. I never really know when I will have to charge the Alta.

review_title: Won't count unless your hands are moving. No walking dogs holding a leash.
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: unless you are swinging your hands it doesn't count steps. Walking a dog holding a leash it doesn't count. Holding the handles on a treadmill it doesn't count.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: OMG. I love this. It's cute and fits my arm nicely, and it keeps track of everything. It helps me to keep in. My target heart range when I'm working out and helps me keep account of my activity so I know when I need to get up and move. Love it!

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: This item fits perfectly and has been helping my wife track her sleep, steps, fitness level, etc. I would recommend this to anyone. We visited Best Buy to get one, but they had limited stock and a higher price when compared to Amazon.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Love my fitbit.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Just what she wanted for Christmas.  My teen bikes and walks all over town and goes to the gym as well.  She didn't wait to get it on her wrist.  I saw her checking it throughout the day.  Good gift.

review_title: I love this! We got one for everyone in the ...
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: I love this! We got one for everyone in the family and it has helped motivate us all to move more

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: I love my Fitbit Alta! The pink and rose gold is so pretty! It is very accurate and sleek. I can definitely tell a difference in my motivation to get up and get moving! I would recommend this to anyone looking to increase their daily steps.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: The device itself is awesome but the pink band got dirty looking within about 48 hours even though I really wasn't around any dirt. It just soaks up color from anything it touches it seems and refuses to come clean.  I'd definitely recommend the black bands.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: So far this is an amazing fitbit! I recently had to replace my old fitbit of 4 years, and this one is fantastic. I love the features, and the fact that you can read your texts on it. And the color is so pretty!!

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Opened the box and to my surprise the band was turned on, stickers removed from the face and placed on the bottom of the box, and rh and band had obvious signs of use on it. You know, that gunk that builds up on watches/bracelets/things of that nature from sweat and various cosmetic buildup. Super disappointing.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Works well. Battery last a couple days before you have to charge. The heart rate didn't always work right.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Love my Fit Bit , but it came with no paperwork so I don't know how to contact anyone if I have trouble with the product.  No information about a warranty or anything.  Wish I bought it somewhere else

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Purchased my first Fitbit in March of 2016. Would not charge after a while. Purchased my second Fitbit in August 2017. Did not use it for awhile because of problems I has to take care of. Now I have the time to use it and this one will not charge. I will be looking for another manufacturer.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: I dont like this as much as I liked my original Fitbit. This doesn't fit as well and doesn't record sleep accurately.

review_title: expected it to be compatible with my LG G6, ...
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: expected it to be compatible with my LG G6, but it wasn't. though seller did refund my purchase price minus shipping cost once they received the product back.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Love it and love the black color!This is one great activity tracker the you can wear on one wrist and wear your regular analog watch on your other.. it works as a sleek bracelet, and a great activity tracker. No to mention that the sleep monitor is very good in conjunction with the hr continuous monitor.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: My kid wanted one of these for their birthday and it was a Black Friday deal so it was a win/win situation!

review_title: Heart beat stopped working after ONE month!
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: The hear beat feature stopped working after 1 month. I tried restarting it, not working. No matter whether the heart feature is set to ON or AUTO on my phone, and the Fitbit Alta HR is synced, I strapped it tightly on my wrist, it just doesn't work anymore. The heart beat light is not flashing either. Bad experience, waste of money!

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: The Heart Rate during exercise  is totally unreliable, my hear rate is 146 and Fitbit shows 96.During calm periods and during sleeping it seems OK.So do not buy it if you want an accurate HR during active periods.

review_title: She loves it. Had one before but it didn't ...
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: She loves it. Had one before but it didn't show heart rate. It lasted several years before it stopped holding a charge. Hopefully this one lasts as long or longer.

review_title: and now I am so glad I decided on this one
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: I vasilated on getting this particular Fitbit Alta HR with the Fuchsia band, and now I am so glad I decided on this one.  I like everything about this Fitbit!  It definitely motivates me to keep moving.

review_title: Didn't work out of the box.
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Unit would not pair up upon initial setup. Will have to utilize the warranty I guess. Disappointed in this

review_title: the glass front scratches far too easily, and it's much bulkier
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: I'm a FitBit fan, but this product is disappointing. I miss the stair counter, the glass front scratches far too easily, and it's much bulkier. I far prefer the original FitBit One

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: I love my tracker. Works really well. I don’t like wearing watches on my wrist. But this one is so light & small that I can’t evan tell it’s there half the time. Battery life runs for about a week for mine. Very easy to set up. Super great buy.

review_title: Its phone integration via the fitbit app was pretty slick as well
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Bought this as a gift for my wife. The device is sleek and stylish. Its phone integration via the fitbit app was pretty slick as well. Easy to set up and immediately useful!

review_title: Works great, and it's a Fitbit so you know what ...
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Works great, and it's a Fitbit so you know what you are getting.  Bought this to replace a different Fitbit model.  Very pleased.

review_title: Paid for a new product, got a used, dirty product.
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: The one star is not for the Fitbit itself but the fact that I paid full price for this Fitbit, a new Fitbit, and when I opened the box everything had already been opened, there's dog hair in it, and the Fitbit is dirty. I am NOT HAPPY. I should have just bought it straight from Fitbit so I would be guaranteed a new product, since that's what I paid for. Also, the user manual is missing.

review_title: Slim design but lots of great features!
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: I'm so glad I purchased the HR Alta! I went back and forth among several of the Fitbit styles before deciding on this one for my second tracker. Previously I had the clip-on Zip, but I wanted to upgrade, and I'm quite happy with this one!!One of the big reasons I decided on this particular style was that it had the HR monitor but it wasn't bulky. I really like the streamlined look of the Alta. It looks more like a watch than a fitness device.Also, with the HR feature, I now use sleep tracking, heart rate zones and resting daily heart rate to make my fitness goals a little more well rounded instead of solely focusing on getting in my steps for the day. I think the HR feature also gives a more accurate calorie burning calculator too.The one downfall is that the automatic exercise recognition is not as good as I was hoping it would be. Many times it does not recognize my workouts. For instance, if I'm on the treadmill with the incline really high...my heart rate is borderline cardio/peak, but since I'm holding onto the bars instead of swinging my arms, the tracker doesn't recognize that I am working out. Really?? I would think the elevated heart rate would be enough for recognition, but apparently not. I have to manually enter many of my workouts, but as long as I keep careful track of the times, the readouts still match up pretty well.Besides the drawback of automatic exercise recognition, I am very pleased with the purchase. It's cute, not obnoxious looking like some of the bigger fitness trackers, and it's making me more conscious of other areas of my health besides just my movement alone.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Great app but lacking features that Jawbone had. Only giving 3 stars because it is extremely uncomfortable to sleep with which is a large pet of why I purchased.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: I bought 2 Alta HR for my parents as a Christmas gift. They both loved them. They are extremely happy about the reminders to move and about how it has motivated them to walk more.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Date, date, time, # of steps, HR, sleep cycles. I love it. Could only be better if it was waterproof.

review_title: This is a great tracker, and I like it much better than ...
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: This is a great tracker, and I like it much better than the Charge HR that I owned previously. The charging mechanism seems much more sturdy than the one for the Charge. My only complaint is that the band has already broken after only about 9 months of use. It's easy to order replacements; I just expected the original band to hold up a bit longer than that.

review_title: I didn’t like how the Fitbit reported calories(very unrealistic)
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Over rated product. I didn’t like how the Fitbit reported calories(very unrealistic). I’ve tried different activity trackers and this one by far my least favorite especially for the price. However I gave it an extra star because The only thing I liked about it was that it let you know when you had a call or text.

review_title: Would go with Apple Watch next time.
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Fits well and works well. I just have not been able to keep it from lighting up in the middle of night. I have read on it and tried all suggestions but it still wakes me. Also , unable to see it in daylight.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: I appreciate knowing how little I'm walking each day  and I appreciate being able to see my texts and calls. Unfortunately I feel that the bands are fragile. My bands started falling off less than 6 months in. It's disconcerting to have your fitbit pop off while running. Its the connection between the band and the device that warped really fast so I"m afraid replacement bands will have the same issue.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: I got this Fitbit and am returning it and getting another charge HR. I don’t like that you can’t manually set it to workout mode and it doesn’t display workout info on the screen during exercise. I like to be able to see my heart rate and calories burned during my workout. I love the look of the Alta HR because it’s so thin, but the trade off is not worth it to me.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: I love this fitbit. I have had two others but this one is much more accurate, and I can tell because tracking my calories burn out and in are so easy now I already lost weight with in the 1st week, and I have been struggling for a while with that! The band isn't as comfortable as the last fitbit I had, I may need to invest in a different one for my personal taste but other than that this works great!

review_title: Does what is intended to do and looks good. It struggles to recognize taps sometimes and it ...
article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Does what is intended to do and looks good. It struggles to recognize taps sometimes and it over-estimates the calories burned each day.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Comfortable and easy to read. Fits well with my other bracelets on the same wrist!

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Product broke in less than 6 months. I thought this was for active use. I guess not.

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: My wife loves it and wears it daily.  She loves seeing how it tracks her steps and sleep!  Definitely a big help in getting healthy!

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)
review_body: Works great - -first one I've had so I can't compare it to others. I almost DON'T  want to know how badly I'm sleeping...:)

article: Fitbit Alta HR, Black, Small (US Version)

review_body: After a couple weeks i think the fitbit isby far worth the purchase this thing is amazing and if you use the app with it youll be on the track to fitness in no time.
